summary: A musician is a person who plays a musical instrument like a guitar or a piano or a person that sings.
full_text:
A musician  is a person who plays a musical instrument or is musically talented. Anyone who composes, conducts, or performs music may also be referred to as a musician.
Musicians can specialize in any musical style, and some musicians play in a variety of different styles. Examples of a musician's possible skills include performing, conducting, singing, composing, arranging, and the orchestration of music.
^ "Musician". Oxford Dictionary. 
^ "Musician". MacMillan Dictionary. 
^ "Types of Musicians". About MusicSchools.com.
title: Musician
